typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true) ~> transactionStream
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true) ~> VaTranscationStream
transactionStream derive(RentalDate = toDate(RentalDate, 'yyyymmdd'),
		ReturnDate = toDate(ReturnDate, 'yyyymmdd'),
		RentalCost = toDecimal(RentalCost),
		LateFee = toDecimal(LateFee),
		RewindFlag = toBoolean(RewindFlag),
		CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(UpdatedDate),
		SourceSysId = 'FC') ~> DerivedColumn1
VaTranscationStream derive(RentalDate = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		ReturnDate = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		RentalCost = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		LateFee = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		RewindFlag = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		CreatedDate = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		UpdatedDate = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
